name: GENIUS Liquid Collagen¬Æ Serum
about: What it is:¬†A vegan collagen serum for face, eyes, neck, and d√©collet√© to help visibly firm, smooth, and reduce intense lines and wrinkles in 10 days...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Patented Alguronic Acid¬Æ: Helps reduce the look of lines and wrinkles and fights environmental damage..- Exclusive Biomimetic Collagen: Helps support and condition the skin to visibly plump and improve the look of texture and suppleness..- Microalgae Oil: Hydrates, nurtures, and visibly restores radiance for a softer look....Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: This serum is formulated with patented Alguronic Acid to address visible signs of aging, Exclusive Biomimetic Collagen that is nearly identical in structure and function to animal-derived, and microalgae oil to hydrate. It‚Äôs all you need to support and condition, visibly improving firmness, suppleness, and radiance...Clinical Results: Results obtained following self-assessments of 85 women, using the product twice daily:.- 94% said it deeply replenishes and helps condition skin in 10 days.- 91% said it restored bounce, resilience, and suppleness to the skin in 10 days.- 91% said skin is visibly nourished and appears healthy and youthful in 10 days..Results obtained in a clinical study of 22 participants using product twice daily (individual results may vary):.- 160% average measured increase in skin elasticity in the neck area in 28 days.- 100% of subjects showed a measured increase in skin firmness and elasticity in the neck area in 28 days.- 100% of subjects showed a measured increase in skin firmness in the cheek area in 28 days
ingredients: -Patented Alguronic Acid¬Æ: Helps reduce the look of lines and wrinkles and fights environmental damage..-Exclusive Biomimetic Collagen: Helps support and condition the skin to visibly plump and improve the look of texture and suppleness..-Microalgae Oil: Hydrates, nurtures, and visibly restores radiance for a softer look....Hydrolyzed Collagen*, Water (Aqua, Eau), Propanediol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Betaine, Pentylene Glycol, Dextrin Palmitate, Collagen Amino Acids* , Parachlorella Beijerinckii Exopolysaccharides, Chlorella Protothecoides Oil, Helichrysum Stoechas Flower Extract, Cylindrotheca Fusiformis Extract, Niacinamide, Tocopherol, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Adenosine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Palmitic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Carbomer, Sodium Lactate, Amodimethicone, Homosalate, Polysorbate 20, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Octocrylene, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Beta-Carotene (CI 40800)....* Hydrolyzed Collagen is created by binding vegetable fibers together to create vegan, plant-based amino acids resulting in biomimetic collagen that is nearly identical in structure and function to animal-derived collagen.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing and toning, apply two to three pumps to entire face, neck, and d√©collet√©. .-For optimal results, follow with moisturizer..-Use only as directed.

reviews.review_text: The Algenist Genius Liquid Collagen Serum, renowned for its promise of youthful skin, continues to intrigue beauty enthusiasts. This revisit delves into whether the serum still lives up to its reputation as a time-defying elixir.  Formulation and Ingredients: Powered by microalgae oil, Alguronic Acid, and vegan plant collagen, the serum claims to hydrate, boost collagen production, and improve skin elasticity. Free from parabens and sulfates, it caters to those inclined towards clean beauty.  Texture and Application: With a lightweight, gel-like texture, the serum absorbs quickly, providing a smooth finish without greasiness. Its gentle nature makes it suitable for sensitive skin.  Results and Efficacy: Users report improved skin texture, firmness, and reduced fine lines with consistent use. Results may vary, requiring patience and regular application.  Packaging and Sustainability: The serum's airtight, pump dispenser in recyclable materials ensures ingredient stability and aligns with Algenist's commitment to sustainability.  Conclusion: Algenist Genius Liquid Collagen Serum remains a standout in skincare, offering an innovative, effective solution for anti-aging. Its commitment to clean beauty and sustainability adds to its appeal, making it a worthy investment for those seeking visible results in their skincare routine.

reviews.review_text: I was gifted in exchange for my honest review. Let me introduce you to the Algenist GENIUS Liquid Collagen Serum, a groundbreaking collagen serum that is specially formulated for your face, eyes, neck, and decollete. This serum is unlike any other, as it contains a unique blend of ingredients that are proven to improve your skin's health and appearance. The key ingredients are alguronic acid, active vegan collagen, and microalgae oil, which have multiple benefits for your skin. Alguronic acid is a patented ingredient that helps to preserve and regenerate collagen, the building block of your skin. Active vegan collagen is a plant-based collagen that mimics the structure and function of animal collagen, helping to plump up your skin and smooth out fine lines and wrinkles. Microalgae oil is a rich source of omega fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamins that nourish, hydrate, and protect your skin from environmental damage. Together, these ingredients create a powerful synergy that transforms your skin. I have noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture, firmness, suppleness, elasticity, and radiance. This serum is truly like liquid gold for your skin, giving you the confidence to shine.

reviews.review_text: Gifted by Algenist, I recently tried the Algenist GENIUS Liquid Collagen and I am absolutely in love with it! After using the GENIUS Liquid Collagen for a few weeks, I have noticed a significant improvement in the overall appearance and texture of my skin. My fine lines and wrinkles appear diminished, and my skin feels plump and hydrated. I also love that this serum has a subtle, pleasant scent that adds to the overall experience. What sets this collagen serum apart from others on the market is its patented Alguronic Acid, which is a powerful anti-aging ingredient derived from algae. This ingredient helps to boost collagen production and improve skin elasticity, resulting in a more youthful complexion. I also appreciate that this serum is free from parabens, sulfates, and phthalates, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. It is also cruelty-free, which is a huge plus for me. Overall, I highly recommend the Algenist GENIUS Liquid Collagen to anyone looking to improve the appearance of their skin. It is a luxurious and effective serum that delivers visible results. Give it a try, and I guarantee you won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Despite only having used this for the last 7 days now (both morning and night followed by moisturizer), I'm already impressed. My skin looks glowing/brighter, rested, more plump, and generally just better overall. Even later on the same day as the very first application I could see a subtle difference in how my skin appears. It hasn't made any difference to texture or pores but I honestly didn't expect it to, going by the ingredients list, and after all that's what my Retinoids, AHA/BHA are there for. I experience zero stickiness when using 1 pump, but I do notice that sticky after feel others have mentioned if I use 2-3 pumps worth, as per the directions on the product. Yes it is pricey, it smells like a frying pan to my nose but personally I don't mind what it smells like when the results are this good! The packaging and product overall is beautiful to look at but aesthetics can sometimes be at the cost of functionality...in this case the pump system is a bit fiddly and sometimes won't dispense properly which can be frustrating. Also I try and avoid fragrance in skincare and would have been a lot happier if this was fragrance-free. In short: it has its minor downfalls (the price being No1!) but its saving grace is its ingredients, everything from peptides to niacinamide, proven ingredients that help the condition and appearance/function of your skin. A bit of a splurge, but one I might just indulge in again.   ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: ‚ÄòDivine Herbal‚Äô - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: ‚ÄòPeter Thomas Roth‚Äô ‚Äì Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: ‚ÄòDivine Herbal‚Äô - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: ‚ÄòSisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: ‚ÄòNuxe‚Äô ‚Äì Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: ‚ÄòSephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

I love the thick glass bottle, it does feel like an appropriate packaging for the price, but as others have said, the pipet system sucks! They really should come up with a better design because it's impossible to use all the liquid in the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Collagen isn't actually absorbed through the skin.  collagen molecules are too large to be absorbed through the pores of our skin, and even if the skin could absorb them, we have to remember that collagens are proteins naturally made inside our body. They would be completely ‚Äúdead‚Äù and inactive by the time we rub them onto the skin. The only reason why your expensive collagen cream feels nice is because it gives cream its consistency.  So for your in store expert to suggest this extremely expensive cream when what I actually requested was a simple Vitamin C serum.. this is highway robbery. This is my first and last time shopping at Sephora.

The serum is then easily sucked back into dropper for you to then dispense on your hand or face.   Do it this way and you will have zero problems.   Am looking forward to my second bottle.

It‚Äôs actually pretty easy to use. Take the pump out of the bottle and take out all the air. While holding the pump down with your finger insert it back into the bottle and then let go. The amount that is picked by the dropper is exactly the amount you will need. It‚Äôs actually a very smart dropper.   I use this product for its moisturizing effects. Collagen that is not produced by your own body has never been proven to do anything to your skin. However applying this product right after my toner and after immediately applying the rest of my products really helps me lock in the hydration. I feel like it‚Äôs great for my combination skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôll start by saying that term ‚Äúholy grail‚Äù makes me wanna hurl. The fact that we as a culture have no better way to say there‚Äôs a fire product on the market is truly astounding. But that‚Äôs neither here nor there because this vial of liquid collagen is God‚Äôs gift to us all.  Don‚Äôt let the ‚Äúrouge‚Äù next to my name fool you ‚Äî I‚Äôm a cheap s.o.b. at heart. But I‚Äôd heard rumblings about this product for a while and I‚Äôd give it a try. I mean the before and after pictures that the company touts are wildly impressive and I wanted to know if they were catfishing. The regular size is $139 Canadian and my bank account was tragically unable to comply, so I went with the mini version for $33.  They verdict? Ladies and gents, this will turn back that clock and give your face the love it craves. My fine lines are drastically reduced, especially under my eyes, which is where I struggle the most. Not only are the wrinkles significantly less visible, I noticed they actually shrunk in length! And the suppleness in the area is more than welcome. I typically despise strong fragrances in products but this is so wonderful I‚Äòm able to overlook that one, small drawback. If it‚Äôs any consolation it does smell lovely...but fragrance means more ingredients and more ingredients means a higher chance of irritation. The good news is I have experienced zero problems using the liquid collagen.     In short, this product really works. I don‚Äôt know why or how and I don‚Äôt think I care. I ultimately ended up buying the larger size when I got my hands on a few more coins and the bottle is scheduled to arrive shortly.   I can‚Äôt recommend this product enough. The price is hefty but the results do not lie! Do yourself a favour and snatch it up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always been very serious about my skincare regimen and the skincare products I use on my face and body.  I know its impossible not to grow old but I plan by God's grace to do it as gracefully as possible.  GENIUS Liquid Collagen is the Holy Grail of Collagen,  before I was using another brand but I felt I was not  getting the maximum benefits of that serum, that being said I am getting older and needed to step up my game. This is definitely a level up and a game changer. I had been researching this brand for about 2 years now but the price had me shook, finally I had gotten a sample of this from Sephora when I purchased the GENIUS Liquid Collagen for lips.  I was feeling quite bland one day and decided to try the sample of GENIUS Liquid Collagen, I was amazed at how my skin reacted, my pores were less visible, my skin remained hydrated throughout the day, so I went back for another sample  my skin reacted the same way and finally on the third day I made up my mind to splurge and invest in my care especially since this item is a bit pricey, it is  worth the splurge though. I have noticed my skin is smoother, my complexion is more radiant  and my pores are behaving nicely not to mention the long term benefits with continued use. Shortly after buying my first bottle ,  Algenist had a 20% off coupon so I got another bottle as my back up and I am thinking about getting another with this current promotion so I don't run out.  I use this along with my Genius Liquid Collagen for lips and my Skinceuticals C E and Ferulic/Phloretin C F serums and I use Supergoop Unseen sunscreen to protect my investment.

And then I had to go and buy the full sized version here of late.  This is the most expensive skin care item I own, and I‚Äôm happy to pay it.    This is a gel-type consistency, with small micro beads suspended in the emulsion.  The dropper is not easy to use, at least to me, but that doesn‚Äôt detract from the product.  It seems like s lightweight serum when you put the drops on your fingers, but those small drops spread out over your face easily.  It feels light upon application, but within a minute or two you start to feel the tackiness of the product (I LOVE tacky-feeling products; if you don‚Äôt, this might not work for you).  The tacky feel works well for me under makeup, but if I‚Äôm using it at night, I follow with this brand‚Äôs night collagen.

reviews.review_text: Had some serious doubts about it, but a couple folks (including my sister) raved about it, so I dropped some cash to try it out (because, lets be honest, it's pricy AF).   I am INTO it. It has done super wonders for my skin (glowy, but not oily). I normally wear a bit of bb cream but I now skip even this step. It isn'a miracle cure, but daaaaaamn. reviews.review_title: False representation between sample and product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I received a sample and loved the texture. A great balance of moisture that wasn't overly oily and made my skin soft and could see considerable differences right away. It has a light scent which is very pleasant so be warned for any persons who need to shy away from fragrance free products. I was so impressed that I spent the $115 for the real deal. Let me start by saying the real product is represented better in the samples. The visual over all look of the producton is different. It's more clear, runny, and less of the yellow beads (I'm assuming collagen).... The product is more greasy and this one makes me breakout. That did not happen with the samples. The packaging is pretty on this unique bottle but the dispenser/dropper is virtually impossible to use!!!! The dropper is not calibrated properly to create a suction to pull any product into the tube!!!!!!!!!!  I've tried all sorts of ways but to no avail it just doesn't work. Save your money! For a $115 you can buy something that doesn't give you pimples and the applicator would actually work and not frustrate the heck out of the user!!!!  There's definitely some false representation between the sample and the actual product.

You need to take the dropper out first, push down to get the air out, then put it back in and let the dropper rise up. reviews.review_text: When I originally ordered this product, I had no idea what it did exactly, but I was looking to try something new & I‚Äôm so thankful I did! This product is amazing! If I‚Äôm being honest, I‚Äôm still not fully educated on the complete spectrum of what it does, but I DO know when I don‚Äôt use it, I can tell a clear difference in the moisture content, plump & brightness of my skin.  I use it as a cocktail with a light Vita C serum. The consistency‚Äôs are comparable & absorb beautifully into my skin together. It creates this perfect foundation for my following serums & moisturizer.  Packaging. It appears that it is somewhat difficult for a lot of people to maneuver. I have not had this experience. Knowing ahead of time that the dropper is fragile & glass, I always am mindful & extremely gentle. They recommend to remove dropper, push button to release the air, and insert back in to product to suction the dose. This way you can avoid adding any additional air into the bottle. I generally do this after each use, so it is all ready for the next time I need it. In reality, you should be using this method with all your beauty products with droppers, as adding air into products will further its oxidation & expire quicker. So they are actually attempting to educate you on proper dropper etiquette. Your skin regenerates approx. every 27days,  Having had used this over a full skin cycle, I can comfortably recommend it to others. I have had an amazing experience with it & find it critical to my daily regime.

It has improved my ‚Ä¢dry skin ‚Ä¢random red, dry patches on my face ‚Ä¢tightness and pulling ‚Ä¢fine tissue-paper wrinkles around the eye ‚Ä¢enlarged pores on cheeks beside nose ‚Ä¢vertical lip lines ‚Ä¢ two deep lines between eyebrows  I don‚Äôt know of another product that helps with 7 different skin problems. Algenist isn‚Äôt promising miracles, so don‚Äôt expect any. But you can bank on visible improvement for lots of common skin issues. And in my case, at least in my case, it outright fixes or eliminates some of those 7 issues. I know that my 54-year-old skin looks about 42 now. I can go out with little or no makeup and my skin just glows and looks younger. Eliminated 3 other beauty products, so I spend less now when buying GENIUS Serum. At night, I smooth any leftover oil from my fingertips onto my eyebrows,‚Äîit works like brow serum! My brows are thick and neat. Bye brow serum, pencils, & fixer! .

reviews.review_text: I got both this and La Mer cream today. Thanks Sephora! Both seems using marine algae as core ingredients.  I tried this product on my right face and La Mer on my left face. It seems that Algenist only formed a oily-feeling layer on my skin without absorption. The oily layer kept on my skin for almost 2 hours. I also tried La Mer cream. It absorbs very quickly and skin feels nourished. On the other hand, I don't know the purpose of using collagen. It has been scientifically approved that collagen can never penetrate into the skin, it only stays on skin and work as natural moisturizing factor. That may explain why this product only stay on the skin without absorption.  I think this product can be only used at nighttime, at least for me. In addition, the smell is a little bit too strong. People even ask me what perfume I wear today~ lol~

Unfortunately, I really don‚Äôt know how this could be considered ‚Äúclean‚Äù when the fragrance is SO STRONG. Granted, it‚Äôs not a bad smell, it‚Äôs fruity and slightly sour in a good candy-esk way. I also LOVED the way it made my skin feel. I did notice a difference in firmness and how smoothly my makeup went on. My biggest issue, and why I wanted to write a review, is because this caused BREATHING ISSUES. I was having trouble for a couple of days and didn‚Äôt realize it was the ultra strong fragrance causing it until one day when I put it on and immediately started having trouble again. This is the whole issue as to why people are moving towards clean beauty; chemicals and fragrance cause real health problems! Jus sayin. If you have any pulmonary issues, STAY AWAY. I might have tried to keep it going, but after seeing way too many documentaries on animal cruelty etc. over the last year, I ultimately decided that I no longer wanted to purchase products that fall under that umbrella. Algenist doesn't test on animals, but they do sell in China where testing is required which still doesn't work for me. Great brand overall and I like some of their other products, but won't be using anymore until they work that out.

reviews.review_title: Excellent if you're not sensitive to niacinamide
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this at an Algenist event in a Sephora store. It has a wonderful, silky texture and smells nice. I could definitely see some plumping in the skin, but I haven't used it long enough to see if the performance justifies the price point. One thing I highly recommend is spot testing this before using it. Some reviewers have experienced breakouts which is likely due to the fact that this formula contains niacinamide --  a wonderful ingredient that some people may be sensitive to. Because this contains niacinamide, I also recommend not using any BHA or AHA directly before or after. That being said, this stuff is great with retinoids / retinol and I will likely be purchasing the full size.

reviews.review_text: So negatives first. The cream has a lovely soft vanilla scent, and the serum inexplicably has an overpowering (to me) perfumey fragrance--very $28 early oughts...not a fan. Secondly, you know how people always say of expensive serum a little goes a long way and you only need a drop? Well, that's often exaggerated, but would be absolute b.s. in this case. You could never spread a drop of this stuff over half a face, let alone face, neck, and chest. I am also skeptical of long term benefits since skin can't absorb topically applied collagen (I read after purchasing). But, and it's a big but, generously applied, this gives the most gorgeous, glowing but non-greasy skin and temporarily plumps and softens fine lines. That is no small feat. It's also a good moisturizer, to the point that if I just want my skin to look amazing under makeup, I can just go in with a cc cream after and skip oil or cream, which is definitely not the norm for my skin. It's a nice primer as well. If you want something for a special event or to use occasionally for going out  (or you just don't mind spending that much on something you'll use up fast), it's worth overcoming the scent and  (my perceived) lack of long term benefits. It looks cool too, like the skincare a mermaid-scientist would use. I probably will not repurchase any time soon, as it's too expensive for me, especially given ny issues with it. Hope that helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Before talking of this product, we need to understand what collagen is, and what it does. Collagen is at the base of the dermis. Collagen, think of it as the springs that give the bounciness to the matress that is the dermis. A healthy yougn skin has a ton of collagen, and that results into even skin tone, bounciness, elasticity and firmness.  Now collagen gets broken for many reasons, hormonal changes, pollution, UVA rays. A comprehensive system that protect that collagen and helps repair it is crucial to mainain a younger looking skin. SPF and Vitamin C here are crucial. Still, no matter how much you protect and address the isue exfoliating, protecting, using all the right anti oxidants, theres always going to be room for improvement.  I received my first bottle of this as a gift, and used it as my essence. I already had a comprehensive skincare routine! Then, I got a second bottle...and so carried on using it.. And then one day I noticed the difference. As result of my age, my jaw has started to loose definition. Nothing terrible, but I can notice it! Also my skin , though healthy and beautiful had loss a tad of its usual glow. Now, the glow is back, and people are complimenting my skin much more tan usual, speciall when not wearing any make up. The only thin I have changed is this liquid collagen, so after pondering about, it makes sense that m skin appears firmer and brighter and just so gorgeous. This collagen, unforunately, works.  It is expensive, Sure. Do you must? No, specially if you alreday have a good routine inplace. Would it improve your skin considerably? Yes it would, so if you have some extra cash to spend, go ahead!  Try it.you mugh be really impressed.

reviews.review_text: I usually dont provide reviews generally...but this product i finished a full bottle and on its span i noticed a lot of difference on my skin. the texture was gone and it helped for my dark circles. I feel my face skin to be of 24 year old even i am 30. I am so much impleressed that i a gettin 2 bottles in the sale as this is pricey but i loved it. reviews.review_text: First off the price is painful and what's worse(or better, I can't decide) is it seems to be working! I almost shed a tear when I clicked purchase! No issue with the smell but the dropper....ugh! I understand how it works, but half the time I can't get enough in the dropper! I also hate packaging that prevents you from getting every drop out of a product that is so stupid expensive! I use it twice a day and have used about 1/4 of the bottle. Unfortunately, in my experience(using it for 4 weeks)it does what it claims to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This does magic on my face! literally obsessed with how well it works! It has helped clean and tone my face, all while giving me that nice fresh and tight feeling! Cannot express how amazing this product is overall. You will not regret this purchase!  I bought this originally for my mother because Collagen is important for aging skin, but as a 22-year-old, this works wonderfully for me as well! It doesn't hurt to start taking care of your skin from now to prevent wrinkles/saggy skin!

I feel like I have pretty good skin for 44, but I saw and felt improvement in my skin that I did not even know I needed! My skin is plumper and smoother, absorbs moisturizer, and looks dewy and well rested. You know how your face looks more radiant and plump after a gentle steaming? Like that!   I hate the price tag, but I‚Äôll pony up for something that works and prevents future sagging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this serum!  I have used other products that have collagen and my sensitive oily skin hadn't agreed with them as they left my skin feeling too tacky.  I received a deluxe sample of this from a purchase online and wasn't sure the first time I tried it.  I initially used 4 drops and that was a bit too much as it did leave my skin tacky.  So I ended up using only 1 or 2 drops and this was the magical amount for my skin.  It has made my skin feel super smooth and it has also helped with plumping and evening out my skin tone, although I do use other products for that as well.  I'm going to have to bite the bullet and buy the full size as I can't see myself living with out it.  If you're on the fence, I highly recommend you try it out.

I wanted to love this so badly I also had very high hopes but sadly it was a let down and caused me to break out like a teenager. Im 28 yr old female with fair, dry, sensitive skin. And I'm someone who never had much acne, the odd pimple here and there but holy! This stuff made my face completely break out. It went away as soon as I stop using it. I also seen no change in the week I used this stuff

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am 63 years old and have some *what I think* are severe creases around my mouth, and a few smaller ones between my brows. This product has eliminated the small lines but not the more severe lines. I have been using it for about 3 weeks. It does have a strong smell so if you are scent-adverse, you won't like it. The smell does dissipate very quickly. I am using this once a day because it is so expensive and I want it to last. The dropper isn't that great. I have tried a ton of different skin care products and within 10 days, I always start to break out. It's pretty much guaranteed to happen. Then I end up returning whatever I purchased. However, I have not experienced that with this product whatsoever.

I love this!! I never sleep cus I have insomnia and I never drink water (BAD!) and this has saved my skin! Why are people complaining about the dropper?! You push the button down before dunking it in and release the button once the dropper is inside the bottle. But anyway this made my skin look super plump and soft the next day I was like what in the miracle!

Nice product but the dropper definitely does not work.  For such an expensive product they should use a better quality dispenser.  I have to pump 5-10 times and sometimes the product comes out and sometimes I have to use a qtip which defeats the purpose of using a dropper. So frustrating!

When I saw this product, I was so annoyed because collagen molecules are too large to be absorbed and/or used when topically applied, so it seemed like a marketing gimmick to me. A deluxe sample was offered as a promo, so I got it, used it and I have seen positive results. I thought maybe I was only imagining it was working, but then I'm getting compliments from people who aren't the complimenting type. Not sure how/what ingredients are helping my skin PLUMP OUT & STAY PLUMPED, but my 39 year old skin looks 35 again. And those are legit results to me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh wow! Do I love this liquid collagen. I have my first bottle and it is almost empty. Time to buy more for sure!  I absolutely love this product and use it along with my Algenist Genius anti-ageing cream. I definitely can see a difference after adding this to my regime. My skin is softer, firmer and more has more radiance. I also see  more resiliency in the texture of my face.   I am in love with this liquid collagen. I will continue to use this along with my other Algenist products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fact that the first ingredient in this product is plant based collagen is absolutely amazing... this stabilized ingredient will literally work wonders, I see such a huge improvement in my skin and did even after a week of using it.. would recommend this to anyone looking to help with texture/firmness of the skin. I even feel as though it has helped with evening the tone of my skin as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: every product that i've tried, and that's been many, have showed results.  what they are exactly at this point are just maintaining and hydrating and a bit of line softening.  they all work together for the most part, i've been using the line since the beginning thanks to sephora and have no plans to change but do like other lines just to try do to a Sephora addition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing.   I've been using La Mer for years and was at Seohora with a friend when the Algenist rep Aaron turned me onto this line.  The liquid collagen is amazing, with the genius cream and eye cream paired with the power night pressed serum.  First time I've actually seen and felt a difference.  I've been using everything religiously for 30 days and am extremely impressed, especially after using the most expensive products on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love Algenist products and was seriously pumped to receive the Liquid Collagen.  I fought with the dropper/delivery system from the first use. For a $115 I have high expectations, and not being able to get the product out was certainly something I didn't want to fight with. I returned and decided not to repurchase as the Store's tester was difficult as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sinks into skin quickly and doesn't leave skin greasy. I can actually see a difference since I've been using this product and my skin looks beautiful. Will definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_title: 28 with fine lines around eyes & forehead
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this sooo much!!!  I thought with the price and technology that was used to create this that it would be amazing!  I tried this for about 3 weeks now and I haven't noticed a thing. I used this in the AM after I washed my face and I used this at night with Luna. I would also follow all the instructions to a T! Then again everyone's skin is different

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: best product of 2017

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This prouduct improves the tone, texture, and hydration level of your skin.  Once I saw that the main ingredient is liquid collagen, I switched from Peter Thomas Roth Firmx with growth factor. I have never been happier with my skin.  The only complaint is the dispenser makes it hard to get enough product .

Tried this for two weeks and had to return it. Did not see results and honestly hated the packaging. It took me so much effort to get the product out with the pump applicator, I felt like I was fighting with the bottle just to use the product. For $150 after taxes, it shouldn't be this difficult. There are other products out there that don't just look pretty, but show actual results. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works as promised. Worth the money. Very nice results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this. I definitely see a softening/minimizing of the lines and wrinkles I'm starting to develop at 45.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I read all the great reviews for this product and I am definitely not disappointed. I try a lot of top end products and this is amazing! Greatly diminished some old skin imperfections and created a beautiful glow...Please keep making it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't know I needed this until I started using it. I'm about to hit the dirty thirty and I've noticed my skin has already changed from my early twenties to my late twenties. This has SIGNIFICANTLY softened my smile lines and the wrinkles around my eyes. some of them have been there most of my life and I'm noticing they are fading. I paired this with korres golden krocus elixir and they are working wonders for me. I also battled cystic acne for years (had to take Accutane) and this has knocked out most of my scaring. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the entire bottle as directed with zero results. I have some fine lines on my forehead and around my eyes and this product did nothing to lessen their appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 27 and like most people my age I'm trying to hold onto my youthful skin. I have oily skin that's acne prone. It's only been two days but I've seen an improvement in my expression lines, the fine lines under my eyes, and my dark circles. I also have not had a problem with this causing breakouts. So far it's been worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A beauty consultant recommended this to me stating how amazing it was.  I thought I'd give it a try.  I found it to be just Ok.  I didn't see any difference in my skin and am almost done with the bottle,  so I have to figure I would have noticed something by now. Won't be purchasing this product again.

reviews.review_title: This could be my replacement for Botox and Filler
reviews.review_text: This product is a bottle of magic! I'm 42 and frequently get Botox and fillers. I have a few fine lines under my cheeks that cannot be filled, without me looking like some kind of alien! I noticed on day 2 of using this, that the lines were starting to diminish! Now I'm using it in every spot I get Botox! Amazing!! Also, the fragrance is not bad like others are saying.

I was told to use this as a pre-treatment before my other serums.  I use under my Vitamin C during the day and under Retinol at night.  After a week using LC my skin has that gorgeous hot yoga glow!  (I've been no where near my studio in months.).     After just over a month of use my hyperpigmentation is significantly reduced and my husband asked if I got back on botox because my smile lines around my eyes are much smother.  I haven't done botox in over a year!    I'm 42, dry with sundamage and smile lines around my eyes and laugh lines.  LC has smoothed everything out so it's not so noticeable.  I LOVE IT!
Noticed a difference within a week. Smoother, younger looking skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The moment I applied it, my skin really feels moisturised and at the same time it's light weight (it doesn't have the thick and heavy feeling). Every morning I wakes up and my skin didn't feel dry at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this and wil be repurchasing. 4 stars for the price, but it feels so good on the skin, and yes, it works. People have noticed a change on my skin after I began using this along with other products from Drunk Elephant ( the Framboos Glycolic night serum and the Lala Retro Whipped Cream),  and a good cleansing ritual with my Foreo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Just wish the dropper worked better. Barely any product comes out. You have to fight with it, but the benefits are worth it
I got a free sample and love it. Definitely buy a new one! Makes my skin feel like a little girl.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this product.  I received 2 of these as a free sample and saw amazing results, so I purchased a full size bottle.  My skin is smoother and I notice the lines are less noticeable and when I use my other facial products I don't have to use as much.  My skin also has this amazing glow and youthfulness.  I highly recommend this product and will definitely keep this in my skincare routine!!

I adore this product. I've been using it twice a day for about three weeks and my skin is smoother and more supple. I've noticed a change in hydration, and tighter pores. Will keep this in my regimen. It's worth the money.

I was FaceTiming with my mom the other day after having used this and she randomly commented how good my skin looks. I wasn't wearing anything other than this product. I'm sad how well this product works because it does carry a hefty price tag. I give 4.5 stars because of the price, but it really is a phenomenal product. My skin instantly looks better when I use this, it absorbs into the skin, smells great, and leaves a wonderful base for moisturizer. The only thing I don't get is if I'm supposed to use a serum first ? (I don't). Also I'm a little annoyed the Algenist brand makes misleading claims about the effects of topical collagen when marketing this, but other than I'm very happy.

reviews.review_title: If you want to at least appear immortal buy this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received one small sample of this. On day 3 I could see the difference! I have really large pores and now I can't see my pores at all. I am on day 6 and almost at the end of my sample but no worries! I ordered the full sized bottle and it arrived yesterday. I use about one to two drops of this under my moisturizer. This stuff goes on light and smells great! My skin has an amazing youthful glow and feels soft to the touch. Best of all, the pores have gone bye-bye. My only regret is that I didn't take a before picture.

reviews.review_title: love this for oiliness!! lifting and firming.
reviews.review_text: Started working FAST! I love when products show results within a week (impatient) but within that week I was head over heels! Definitely will be purchasing again. Seriously love this stuff it had a brighting affect on the skin that made it look glowing but not to greasy.
I LOVE this product! It gave my skin such an instant healthy glow -- I've stopped using any serums in the daytime!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been battling some dermatitis. Since I have been using this product I have had no issues. My skin feels nice and smooth. I have few breakouts, but not sure I can attribute it to this product alone. Price is a bit steep, but otherwise thumbs up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST!!!! The first step to my skincare routine morning and night!!!! Collagen is listed as the FIRST ingredient, even before water! Go check all your so called collagen boosters ladies... this one is magic!!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product everyday for 2 weeks and haven't noticed any positive changes in my skin.  To the contrary, my pores seem more congested.  Considering the price, I expected at least minor improvements to my skin. Also, it has very strong perfumey fragrance.  The fragrance goes away quickly, but I'm not a fan of putting perfumed products on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a deluxe sample and love the Algenist line. I am 29 years old and have been using this in the morning for 2 weeks and notice a slight difference in firmness. I am curious to try a full size day and night for a few months with the change I have seen. Texture is runny with yellow bubble like things which feels weird and smell is light.
I want to take a bath in it!   The texture of my face is smoother and more radiant.   You will need a moisturizer.   However, this serum did not leave me dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for 3 weeks. I used it both day and night. I honestly saw no difference in my skin at all. I added it to my usual day and night routine and I saw no improvement of fine lines. I'm 32 and have some pretty deep expression lines already. This did nothing to alleviate those at all. I also didn't notice it making my skin any more hydrated, glowing, or even than normal. It didn't make my skin worse though either. Thankfully it didn't make me breakout so that's a point in its favor.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Combo skin that requires effort every so often, smells fantastic, easy to use and results are amazing!

After reading rave reviews on Sephora site, I decided to get it a week before my birthday. I was in the mood to splurge and also wanted to look great on my birthday. It was the best product I've ever had. I am always trying new products and have used numerous items since I was a teenager. Nothing works as FAST as Algenist Liquid Collage. Right away I noticed the difference. My face is glowing. I can't believe some of the reviews mention people will pass on such an effective product due to the fragrance. Please just get it even you have to breath through your mouth :)

I was so excited to use this product based on all the awesome reviews I saw. Unfortunately it did not work for me. After I used it regularly for about 1.5 weeks, I realized it was responsible for breaking out my skin. Sadly I had to return. As soon as I discontinued use, and returned to my normal skincare routine, the breakouts disappeared.

Amazing product! I've been using this for a month twice a day after I wash my face and before any other products and I have seen amazing results! I lost a significant amount of weight and my skin on my face had gotten very loose and wrinkly. After using this religiously for the last month my face is firmer and all my lines have vanished! It's my HG product that I will never go without!
This stuff is expensive! But honestly you get what you pay for I love this stuff and will be repurchasing when it runs out! Love how my skin feels and looks ‚ù§Ô∏è

I received 2 trial sizes of this product and fell in love with it immediately. I typically wouldn't spend this much on one product, but it took only a few days for me to notice a difference in my skin. When I wear this, I have a healthy, more youthful glow and my skin looks so much better! I worried about it making me appear more greasy since I have oily skin, but this hasn't been the case. I also have extremely sensitive skin and this is gentle on it. I strongly recommend this for those looking  to make skin look more radiant!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample and used it every night for two weeks. No product has ever been able to soften my insomnia wrinkles, but this did. They're almost completely gone, now. I would normally never pay this much money for skincare, but this works too well to pass up. TOTALLY worth the money.

GENIUS LIQUID COLLAGEN is AMAZING! I've been using it for about a month, maybe longer and my skin looks thicker and plump, my forehead lines are disappearing.  I look younger. For real. No blurring or tricks with light. My skin looks healthier.  People are complementing me!! I got a you look great   and a what's your secret. I'll admit, I am taking more time to do my make up- because it's much more fun to do it when you're not trying to hide your skin. I have eczema currently and STILL my skin just looks better.   I use this as directed after cleansing and toning/ essence'ing and let it fully absorb before completing my routine. The directions indicate to use as directed  as a precaution. So.... it may not work otherwise.  It does have an unpleasant smell... to me it smells like deep frying grease... but it dissipates almost immediately. And it could smell like wet dog and I'd still use it. It's just amazing. And I don't think you'd get much out of it unless you had mature skin. Younger women, save your money for preventive skin care. I'm 49 and GENIUS LIQUID COLLAGEN gives skin back its healthy looking thickness and plumpness and youthful healthy look that's beyond what any moisturizer can do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product at first. You can see an improvement in fine lines within the first week of use. My only complaint is that it clogged my pores and made me breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best and most reliable product I ever used. Best texture and smell - and super effective.
After day 4 it broke me out!! Smells cheap!! No thank u!! Not worth that price tag!!!!
Love love the way this works! Instantly feels plump, healthier and skin looks rejuvenated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really had high hopes for this since it was sooo expensive and promoted so much. It broke me out along my chin. I hadn't had breakouts in a long time. I gave it a few days and tried again and the same thing happened. I'm bringing it Back tomorrow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was optimistic about trying this new product! But with the first use, it irritated my face and felt too sticky for day wear. Perhaps the fragrance caused the irritation, as there don't seem to be rejuvenating ingredients like retinol, glycolic, or vitamin c, that are known irritants (in a good way, though). I can't decide if I'll try it on my neck (it needs help) or return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First of all I have been using this for about a week and don't really see a difference in my skin.  Was focusing especially on my neck since I am older.  Will see how that goes.  However, the dispenser for this product is ridiculous.  I can pump it several times and get no product one time and then pump it once or twice the next and get too much product.  It is just ridiculous.  The smell is a little off but wears off quickly. Not sure I would purchse this again due to the smell and the dispenser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. It goes on smooth. I was a bit apprehensive about buy do to the price but it is so worth it. I started seeing results after just 5 days of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. I saw results on my skin in just 7 days. Friends asked me if I got a facial cus I was looking really fresh and good.

reviews.review_title: So far so good but the applicator - meh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only been using it a week. I haven't seen the dramatic change others have noted (but then my skin is 49 yrs old!). I like the texture and have high hopes as I like most of the Algenist line. I did drop a star due to the packaging. You get the product with a plunge dropper. It's just little more difficult to get the right amount of product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my sixties and have been looking for new products as my skin matures.  This serum is a winner.  I have been using it every night and the results are amazing.  The tone and texture have improved.  I loved waking up to bright, plump skin.  Wow!  I'm going to take a look at their entire line now?

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used it for a few days, it's very thick.  I don't think it's amazing.  It works well as moisturizer but I don't think it's that special.  Also, the dropper thing doesn't really work.  The liquid gets stuck and won't come out.  Did I get a bad bottle?  When I tried it in the store, it was more liquid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've only used it a few times, but it feels amazing! It also has a wonderful fragrance. I really wish they would make a perfume that smells like it! It's so luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really really really didn't want to love this stuff but I do.I got a small sample of it and there is so much I love about it. After only a couple days my skin is clearer, pores are smaller, and even some scaring is gone. I hate to say it because it is so much money but this stuff is amazing and it is a miracle worker. I use it sparingly too. Also I have oily skin and this does not clog my pores. I am prone to break outs too. I just love it. It's amazing and I am definitely purchasing a full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just start off by saying that I am only 20 years old and already own this product. I am conscious about aging gracefully and do everything I can to achieve that. With that said, even I noticed a tightening effect after one use! I woke up with a firmer feeling face and felt as though my face was stiffer in the best way possible. I'm actually going to get this for my mother and grandmother so that they can try it in conjunction underneath their night cream and see what results they notice! Definitely something to try to say the least. I would go with this as an attempt towards anti-aging before something medical. I will certainly repurchase.

The product itself is great, but the packaging is terrible! I can't get the dropper to actually get any product and have to dump in my hand. For the price, this is not worth it. I'll have to return, sadly.

reviews.review_title: Already seeing significant improvement in my skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size with my last order and have been using this at night for about 5 days now. My skin isn't too bad in the first place, but I do have some uneven tone and deep hereditary wrinkles on my forehead. At 26, the wrinkles really bother me and I have tried several creams and serums. I can honestly say I have already seen a significant difference in my skin. The wrinkles aren't as deep and my skin is much more even and bright. I will definitely be getting this in the full size. Highly recommend.
AMAZING!!!!! Firming, plumping, hydrating!! Everything in one!! Amazing

reviews.review_title: Love it on my normal to dry skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just received a sample size and tried it before bed and in the morning. May be I would have to post an update later, but I visibly can see my dry/normal skin getting plumper. I have fine lines around my mouth and they became visibly softer. So far I do plan to purchase a full size. If you have an oily skin I would suggest trying a sample before the full commitment since the product has a bit oily, may be even a hint of silicone texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it's expensive but worth it. I'm only 20 so I don't need firming action. but this product has improved my texture and it hydrates so well that it's replaced multiple products in my daily routine. a little bit goes a long way, and it smells good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to try this, but I am so glad that I did. Within the first use, my skin looked more hydrated and smoother, and with each day of using it, I am noticing firmer, more youthful skin. The tiny lines I have when I smile around my eyes are fading fast and my skin tone is much more even. I have read complaints about the scent, but truthfully, I am quite sensitive to perfumes and this doesn't bother me at all.

reviews.review_title: for acne prone skin and scars!
reviews.review_text: Omg! Awesome! I struggle with cystic acne and the aftermath of craters and scars. The ingredients I need are collagen, vitamin C, and AHAs. It's difficult to find products with these ingredients and non comedogenic. I wish it wasn't so expensive but it works and replaces a lot of other beauty products I use.

reviews.review_title: Am I crazy to notice better skin already?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Am I crazy? I have been using it twice a day for a little over a week and would swear that I am seeing results already. It's not cheap so I would want it to work but working this quickly? I love it! It does have a fragrance to it. I am not sensitive to scent and I actually quite like the smell. It feels moisturizing on it's own and makes my skin soft, smooth and absolutely glowing. The fine lines around my mouth and my crows feet have improved a lot. I am excited to see what happens with continued use. I will purchase the cream from this line too once the current cream I am using is finished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Some have complained about the scent of this product but I *love* it, in fact after putting it on for the first time last night my fiance said I smelled SO good! He's particular about scents so that's a win in my book. I received a deluxe sample, but I know I'll be purchasing soon. Since I've only used it once, I'll report back after I've been using it a little longer, but I love the feel of it, very rich, which I don't find off-putting.

reviews.review_title: Amazing product it really works , used for a week
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok this product is amazing !!!! No joke I have tried it all from Chanel to le mar to anything that I hear people say may work neutrogina and oil play and retinol stuff I still had lines on my forehead and bags under my eyes . This product is so moist and pleasant my face feels so young my forehead looks great I usually have deeper lines in my forehead and I'm 39 I still look like a kid but my forehead was a mess . I was actually thinking Botox because I can't stand it . I used this for a week after seeing the samples I got in the last purchase I made and I saw this on their website it was new and sounded really good . When I tell you it really really works I'm not lying I swear I look younger and glowing skin !! For me the cost is nothing compared to getting rid of these lines on my head and fix the under eyes but it made my whole face brighter and I feel pretty again I barely need makeup . I been using it for a week !!!! Works fast and is the best product I ever purchased ! Thank you to who ever invented this stuff cause it's the greatest think since sex hahahaha
I wanted to love this.....but I can't use it bc the perfume smell is WAY TOO STRONG...so disappointed

I usually love Algenist products, but sadly in the case, the fragrance is just too heavy. And it lingers like a heavy perfume. It's so unfortunate, because I love the other ingredients in this product.

I got this because I trust Algenist, but also because it's stunning to look at. Same goes for the results - effective as expected, but also I love using it every day! You can for sure smell the collagen, but it's the first ingredient, so that's not surprising. My skin looks great and make up goes on easy.

As for someone over 40 who has been 50/50 conscious about skincare until maybe 10 years ago, I told myself when I saw the ratings on this Serum to go ahead and purchase it. I have been using it for a week and prior to that, my facial serum was Est√©e Lauder's Midnight Recovery for PM and Dior for AM. also, I have always received compliments regarding how nice my skin looks. I do have a few sunspots from playing beach volleyball for years so I do invest on products that help with dark spot lightening and face brightening. I've been using this Genius Collagen for a week both under makeup and without. One thing I don't look forward to using this product is this slight not-so-nice scent that it has. For the price, I think I should've observed some changes already. I use the Algenist Sublime Defense religiously and the Algenist eye balm so if ever, my skin looks great now because of these and from using the Estƒìe Lauder Serum for years. Hmm, does this mean I'll have to be using this Liquid Collagen for years too, to see improvement ? Or does it just delay aging signs ???
The collagen really absorbs well into the skin!

Algenist is hands down one of my top holy grail skincare line and I'm happy they came out with this liquid collagen serum. I've been using it for two weeks and saw a major difference in making my skin so smooth.

Love this product! I like trying new skincare products and this one is just amazing. The biggest difference I noticed was that it evened out my skin tone and I had less fine lines. This is a staple in my skincare routine now! Worth the money.
Another winner from my absolute favorite skin care line.

I have absolutely never seen a product work like this - I have acne prone oily skin. It has made my skin more plump, soft, and all my little forehead bumps vanish. I am soooo grateful for this product. Worth every dollar.

Cannot say enough good things about this product, the scent is high-end and the results are BEYOND! It does have a bit of an oily/sticky finish but I just apply it about 15 minutes before bed to let it absorb a bit. After the first night I was impressed and the second night I couldn't believe how great my skin looked!! It plays well with prescription retin-a too so I was also happy about that! Definitely worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a high hope on this but turned out it is very disappointing. It is very very very sticky, and way too fragrant.  Every time I tried less and less and less, to the point just a tiny dot to put around my eyes I still feel sticky and heavy. After a while my face starting to became really greasy. Had to return it within a week.

Despite purchasing multitudes of products over many years & liking many of them, this is my first review.  I was skeptical at first, not expecting any results long term, much less practically overnight.  But, I am truly amazed at the change in my skin.  It looks plumper, smoother, less noticeable pores and in general, younger!  I am truly amazed and beyond pleased.  Yes, it is pricey, but you certainly get your money's worth which doesn't often happen.  Take a chance, you'll be glad you did.

I have Been monitoring the reviews while I wait 10 days to review. I was ready after 3 days though. I bought this with scepticism but its Algenist! And I regret nothing. I saw a huge difference in crows feet, 11 lines and overall radiance in days. I agree with every review before this one. This product is legit and delivers what it says. Well done Algenist.

If you are on the fence or wondering if this is worth the hefty price tag then just know; IT IS. I've been using for literally 2 days and I'm already in love with this product. you can feel the difference in your skin and can tell the product is working. absolutely. 100%. worth it. splurge for this product you won't regret it.

I've been using this for a little over a week now and wow! My skin tone is more even and the texture on my cheeks from pores/acne scars is much smoother. I've tried endless products that claim to smooth texture and even out skin tone but this one is for sure the best at sephora. Don't hesitate because of the price it's worth it!!!

I saw the amazing reviews on this and had to try it. It lives up to the hype. I have been using it for about a week now (sometimes twice a day), and I am loving it. I have very dry, sensitive skin, and this has been great. It came with samples of the genius ultimate anti aging cream, which I liked so well (and smelled so good!) that I went out and bought that as well. I have been following with a heavy moisturizer, which is great for my dry skin, but this provides light hydration without any grease or weight. This works into your ordinary skin care routine easily, and so far is giving me great results--great glow and bounce for my 29 year old skin. I will definitely repurchase this and was pleased with the bottle size for the price. Can't wait to try more products from this line and brand. Love the use of natural/nonharmful ingredients too!!

this stuff is amazing!! even after 3days of useing twice a day.my skin looks younger.more radiant.i just turned 31 and am very concerned for fine line and early signs of ageing.this is a game changer.i just ordered another bottle aleady.because i can see how great this works.its way expensive.yes.but if it works like it says.then the 115 price tag is totally worth it.and this does work!! im amazed

I literally noticed a difference within the first two uses! I can't wait to see my skin after the 10 uses they recommend! I'm absolutely in love with this stuff, the first product to actually do what it says it will. My skin instantly looked more glow-like and my pores had seriously reduced.
I just received my product & haven't used but once. Smells delicious, feels silky, looks amazingly radiant on. I would say it's like liquid gold in a bottle. I'll review again after 10 days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical at first but I now I can't live without this product! Usually collagen doesn't full absorb. This one sinks in nicely and I say a difference in the softness to my skin as well as more bounce after just a day or two. I use this morning and night. I use about a little less than a full dropper each application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best products I've ever tried. I use it after the toner and it has been giving my skin so much elasticity!! I look younger than when I started using it.

The gentleman who works for the line, Aron told me about this product while I was shopping.  I wisely took his advice and purchased.  My skin is visibly softer and plumper!  I'm also mixing it into my foundation.  Great GLOW.  Tons of compliments too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To say that this product has made a difference in the overall texture and feel of my skin would be an understatement. It's a Vegan product that really works and is worth the investment. And, you won't find Collagen buried near the bottom of the ingredient list - it's actually the very first ingredient. Well done, once again, Algenist.
Only been using this Collagen for 2 days but already notice a smoothness to my skin...can't wait to see what 30 day results will be!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is in pretty good shape generally so I'm always impressed when a new product really makes  a difference. From the first time I used it, my skin had an improved glow. I've been using it every day for about 2 weeks and I'm still loving how it makes my skin feel and my foundation look afterwards.

Investing in this product was a serious step for me. I'm mid 30's and I feel my skin has lost its bounce. Imagine my surprise watching my skin transform with each days use. I held Algenist to their 10 day result, and after my 10 days my skin is brighter, firmer, and softer. Very impressed, and I highly recommend giving this product a try. I love the ingredients also vegan products are hard to come by. Highly recommend!!!

Algenist you have done it again!! I LOVE this product for the results I'm seeing on my skin.  My eyes look younger, my neck looks firmer and my forehead with those lovely 11'evens are looking smoother.  To boot it's Vegan and Collagen is the first ingredient.  I'm so IMPRESSED.

I was lucky enough to receive this product during a press event a few weeks ago. I have been using it ever since and I am completely blown away with the difference I've seen in my skin. I noticed after turning 30 that I was developing smile lines  and after using this product I am seeing them fade away.  I can't wait to see what other changes take place after continued use!  I will definitely be buying this product once I run out.

reviews.review_title: Skin So Smooth and OMG, my neck!!!!!!
reviews.review_text: This is EVERYTHING! My skin feel and looks smoother, and the little bit of looseness on my neck-GONE! In less than 2 WEEKS!!!! I fit this into my routine so easily! It goes on right under my other day serum! It smells amazing and my makeup even wears better. Win, win!

reviews.review_title: I saw a difference in 10 days!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
reviews.review_text: I am in ‚ù§Ô∏è with Liquid Collagen! I couldn't believe the difference I saw after 10 days of using it. I'm so trying to other products in line after this one delivered beyond expectations.

I was able to get first access to this new product, and words don't express the incredible results I've seen in such a short time!! I have redness on my face, along with signs of aging, and this is a miracle in a jar!!!! I've seen improvements with BOTH areas of concern and couldn't be happier to continue watching my skin revert back to its youth!!!! This is a must-have for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After two days of using Liquid Collagen I noticed the texture on my forehead and cheeks looked and felt smoother. I also saw the redness around my nose & cheeks was less predominate. I love the smell and texture. It soaks into the skin very fast and doesn‚Äôt feel greasy or heavy. This is my go-to product! My skin is sensitive, combination dry on the forehead & oilier on the nose.

The name says it all! I can't get enough of this. Gorgeous on my skin. No more creases from sleeping.  My skin is plump and has this gorgeous glow. I love the little gold beads. It's definitely my new must have. LOVE.
